summary: REQ-29 appears implemented: VisualTrustSection image URLs for positions #2, #3, #4, and #6 are updated to the specified external postimg.cc URLs, and the prior TODO about a missing 6th URL is no longer present. No clear evidence of layout/caption/ImageWithFallback changes beyond the src updates. Two non-requested metadata/state files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state files unrelated to the requested VisualTrustSection URL updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requested updating image sources (and removing/updating the TODO) in `frontend/src/components/sections/VisualTrustSection.tsx`. The diff shows additional modifications outside that file.
